cause.description:
If we wanted to pay for knowledge we would all be Scientologists!
How do we educate the poor with pecuniary restrictions on e-information?
Free the auto-didact by freeing the word (and number of course)!
Why should we pay a periodic subscription for one day's need?
Why must my curiosity be quelled by the hefty price of a few pages of electronically simulated data?
***I DONOT BENEFIT FROM ANY DONATIONS - THEY GO DIRECTLY TO THE NONPROFIT PATRON LISTED ABOVE***
1. Students of any age should not have to pay for e-knowledge! PERIOD.
cause.mission: Create free access to all e-knowledge
cause.name: Free the Knowledge
